text: John Frail (23 July 1882 – 9 May 1915) was a Scottish professional footballer who played in the Scottish League for St Bernard's as an outside right. == Personal life == Frail was married with two children. He served as a private in the Black Watch during the First World War and was killed in action in Pas- de-Calais on 9 May 1915.
